title: Add pass package to home-manager email configuration
notes: Prerequisites for password management setup. Add 'pass' to home.packages in home-manager/server/email/default.nix alongside lynx, chafa, and poppler_utils.

title: Configure aerc with unsafe-accounts-conf setting
notes: Required for passwordCommand to work with accounts.email module. Update programs.aerc.extraConfig to include: general = { unsafe-accounts-conf = true; }. Despite the ironic name, this is necessary and safe when using passwordCommand.

title: Set up accounts.email configuration for aerc
notes: Main declarative email account configuration. Create accounts.email.accounts structure with IMAP/SMTP settings (use placeholder values). Set up passwordCommand = "pass show email/personal". Enable aerc integration with aerc.enable = true. User will need to fill in actual email addresses, servers, and account details. Depends on nixos-1 and nixos-2 being completed first.

title: Document pass setup steps for email passwords
notes: Add comments/documentation to email/default.nix for manual setup steps. User needs to: 1) Generate GPG key: gpg --gen-key, 2) Initialize pass: pass init "your-gpg-id", 3) Store passwords: pass insert email/personal (or whatever path matches passwordCommand). Optionally document encrypting ~/.password-store with git-crypt for backup.

title: Clean up and remove plan.md
notes: Delete plan.md after implementation is complete. This temporary planning document is no longer needed once the aerc email configuration has been successfully implemented.
